title.rendered: Vaughan Handyman: Get Organized With These Garage Decluttering Tips!

content.rendered:
If your home is well-organized but your garage is a disaster, you’re not alone. The garage is sometimes the forgotten extra space in a home that doesn’t get the same attention as other rooms. Your garage may need a decluttering intervention so you can utilize this space more effectively. At Handyman Connection, we offer home storage solutions for residents in the area.

Organize Your Garage

Having an organized garage gives you and your family many more options for storage. When you take the time to tackle this organization project, you get more space to park your cars, store outdoor landscaping equipment, house sporting goods and use your garage in a more effective way. A cluttered, messy garage is also more vulnerable to insects and other unwelcome wild animal guests in the space.

Handyman Connection provides remodelling services that allow you to get the most out of your garage and home storage. Here are some ways to declutter and organize your garage:

Install Shelves in the Garage

To start the organization process, you need to figure out what kind of system you need in your garage to keep everything in its place. Shelves are a great tool that can easily and effectively store things in the garage. Our pros can install garage shelves along the walls of the space and free up the interior for car parking. This will give you a way to find important items easily and keep everything out of the way.

Repurpose the Space With Bins

Another easy organization tip is to go out and purchase clear plastic bins for the garage. This is an affordable solution for home storage. Plastic bins can be stored and stacked along the perimeter of your garage. The clear plastic material allows you to see exactly what is inside so you can quickly find what you need. Plastic bins are ideal for storing seasonal items, decorations, toys, games and other items that aren’t used in your home on a regular basis.

Purge Anything You Don’t Need

An essential tip for staying organized is managing your stuff and knowing when to start getting rid of things. In most garages, there are items stored inside that could be thrown away to reduce the clutter. Take some time to go through everything you have in your garage and sort out the trash from the treasure. Purge anything you don’t need anymore to free up more space in your garage and lift a weight off of your shoulders.

Plan Out Your Space

Most importantly, you should work with a skilled professional handyman in Vaughan with experience in remodelling garages to revamp the space. Handyman Connection can help you assess your garage space and plan out something that is more cohesive and convenient. We can also help with installing shelving, ceiling hooks and other organizational features in your garage to keep everything in its rightful place. Then, we can give you tips for garage storage for automotive supplies, sports gear, bicycles and tools.

Home Storage Solutions That Work

Storage in the home is often overlooked and not addressed until it becomes a problem. The key to using your space more effectively is to have a solid storage solution for your rooms and your garage. Working with a pro contractor can help you maximize your storage space and free up your home’s layout for enjoyment and entertainment.

Let us schedule a time to come out to your garage for some help with storage and organization. Handyman Connection employs a team of experienced professionals who provide creative storage solutions that make you love your home and appreciate its features.
